creator: Mzagerman305
title: Jack Daniels Independence Project - Clothing Label
materials_required: American Apparel 100% fine ring-spun cotton tees
description: This project is a pitch to Jack Daniels for funding to start a clothing label. The label will focus on hip-hop, rock & pop-culture references with symbolism & strong graphics, experimenting with tie-dye & acid wash.
steps: Establish connections with local graphic designers, distributors, wholesalers, and other local brands to become familiar with the industry and production process.
Develop designs incorporating hip-hop, rock, and pop-culture references with symbolism and strong graphics.
Experiment with tie-dye and acid wash techniques to create unique and out-of-the-box designs.
Source American Apparel 100% fine ring-spun cotton tees for screen-printing.
Utilize social media networks as the main marketing tools to create initial buzz online and in the street.
Start paying design team to motivate them and help them create new designs.
Cover production costs for screen-printing and materials for a smooth process.
